```py
SELECT 
   type,
   AVG(price) AS avg_price
FROM melb
GROUP BY type
```

```py
SELECT 
   regionname,
   AVG(price) AS avg_price
FROM melb
WHERE regionname LIKE 'Northern%'
GROUP BY regionname
```

```py
SELECT 
   regionname,
   'all' AS type,
   AVG(price) AS average_price
FROM melb
WHERE regionname LIKE 'Eastern%'
GROUP BY regionname
UNION ALL
SELECT 
   regionname,
   type,
   AVG(price) AS average_price
FROM melb
WHERE regionname LIKE 'Eastern%'
GROUP BY regionname, type
ORDER BY regionname, type
```

```py
SELECT 
   regionname,
   type,
   AVG(price) as average_price
FROM melb
WHERE regionname LIKE 'Eastern%'
GROUP BY 
   GROUPING SETS (
     (regionname),
     (regionname, type)
   )
ORDER BY regionname, type
```
